channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Radxa X4L: A Pocket-Sized Powerhouse
item.description: A powerful pocket-sized PC featuring the Intel N100 processor, dual 32-bit LPDDR5 memory channels, and versatile OS support. Ideal for home automation, virtualization, and portable computing.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5: Performance, Testing, and Potential
item.description: Unleash Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5: compact, versatile mini-computer for high-speed storage, DIY NAS, and innovative projects.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: How to Install OS on Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 with eMMC Storage
item.description: Step by step guide to install Raspberry Pi OS on Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 with eMMC Storage
